items.title: Implement AI Recommendation Engine
items.description: Develop and integrate an AI-based recommendation system to suggest products to users based on browsing and purchase history.
acceptance_criteria: System generates at least 5 relevant product recommendations per user session
Recommendations update dynamically based on user interactions within the same session
Recommendation accuracy achieves at least 70% relevance score in A/B testing
non_functional: System must handle concurrent requests from at least 10,000 users
Data privacy compliance with GDPR and CCPA

notes: Assumed that the platform already has a product catalog and user account system. Requirement for AI recommendations is interpreted as personalized suggestions based on user behavior.
